*Publisher's Description*

"What would you do if you thought you murdered your best friend? And if
everyone else thinks so too? What if the truth doesn't matter? As Lucy
Chase's Texas hometown begins to tell versions of what happened and who
Lucy is to a nationwide, true crime obsessed audience, at the bequest of
her grandmother, she returns to the place she vowed never to set foot in
again to solve her friend's murder, even if she is the one that did it"--
